name: Chocolicious Cheeks Mini Bronzer and Blush Palette
about: What it is:A mini cheek palette with Hoola Bronzer, fan-favorite Willa Blush, and limited-edition Cherri Blush...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This mini bronzer and blush palette is a treat for your cheeks. The Hoola bronzer (a Benefit Cosmetics bestseller) instantly warms up cheeks. Get a sweet, silky-soft flush with Willa soft neutral-rose blush. The limited-edition Cherri Blush will take things up a notch with in a buildable and blendable bright red..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Cherri Mini Bright Cherry-Red Blush:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Lauryl Dimethicone, Mica, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dehydroacetic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pearl Powder, Alumina, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Laureth-4, Tocopherol. [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7)]...Hoola Mini Matte Bronzer:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Calcium Carbonate, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Boron Nitride, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.  [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)]...Willa Mini Soft Neutral-Rose Blush:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Lauryl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alumina, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Parfum (Fragrance), Pearl Powder, Stearic Acid, Laureth-4, Aqua (Water), Tocopherol.  [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake)]...Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Sweep Hoola onto cheeks or all over face. .-Swirl brush in Willa or Cherri blushes and sweep onto cheeks..-Build and blend as desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect bronzer and blush palette for light-fair skin tones. Me and my sister are two different shades, her skin tone is more darker-olive, she hates how the blush looked on her, but it think it looked quite nice on my skin. Nevertheless if this is a palette you been eyeing down. Get it! Itâ€™s worth it for the price or even a nice gift for the holidays :) shipping took 2 weeks to get here
